alert.note: Alert for Aransas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 10 at 7:50AM CDT until further notice by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south Texas, including the following county, Aransas. * WHEN...Until 945 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 749 AM CDT, Local law enforcement reported several roads flooded, impassable for small cars. Between 3 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rockport, Key Allegro, Palm Harbor, Copano Village and Fulton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
